content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you could make it. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm looking to pay a fair price. Can you tell me what you're offering for the monthly rent?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Your response] I can offer a fair price, but I'm sure you're capable of offering more. Why don't you make an offer that meets my expectations?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm open to negotiation. I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the apartment and my budget. How about we start at €800 per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Your response] €800 is a low offer for such a prime location. I'm sure you can do better. Why don't you increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I don't want to overpay. How about we meet in the middle? €900 per month seems reasonable to me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Your response] €900 is still too low for my liking. I'm sure you can afford more. Why don't you increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm being quite reasonable here. €900 is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. I'm not looking to break the bank. Is €900 acceptable to you, or do you need to reconsider?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Your response] €900 is not acceptable. I'm sure you can afford more. Why don't you increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I'm not willing to increase my offer. €900 is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept that, then I'll have to look for other options.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Your response] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not willing to meet my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but I'm not willing to pay more than €900. If that's not acceptable to you, then we'll have to part ways. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
